availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Anthony C. McElroy (Springfield, ky bank cashier)

body.p: Springfield, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret C. McElroy. Merchant in Springfield in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Springfield District No. 1, p. 135. Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Springfield, district 128, sheet 4A, family 71.
